title: Villainess VS Zombies - Novel Updates
tags: Broken Engagement   Depictions of Cruelty   Female Protagonist   R-15   Zombies
author: ダイスケ
description:
'I will break the engagement with you!'

The story that started with exilement of the villainess, turned into a chaos due to the zombie panic outbreak.

But the villainess did not panic.
Because she had received the highest level of education「just in case」anything like this happened.

'Did you know? the trained sword techniques won't betray you!'

The Prince? he'll die right away so there's no need to worry.
>
